data.text: “Today I am again complaining bitterly/strongly to God;
I ◄wish that I knew/want to know► where I could meet/talk with him,
If I could do that, I would tell him why I know that I am innocent;
Then I would find out what he would reply to me [DOU].
Would he use his great power to argue with me?
I am ◄an honest/a righteous► man; so I would be able to discuss things with him fairly,
“But, I have gone to the east, and he is not there;
I have gone north and I have gone south,
But he knows how I have conducted my life;
I [SYN] have faithfully walked on the path that he showed me;
I have always obeyed what he [SYN] commanded;
“He never changes. There is no one who can [RHQ] stop him from doing what he desires.
And he will finish doing for me the things that he has planned for me;
So I am terrified in his presence;
Almighty God has caused me [SYN] to feel terrified [DOU].
It is as though there is only thick darkness in front of me,
